title: Pâtissier-San To Ojousan
alternative_title: Patishiesan to Ojousan ; Patissier & Mademoiselle ; Patissier et Madamoiselle ; Patissier-san to Ojou-san ; Pâtissier et Mademoiselle ; パティシエさんとお嬢さん
status: Patishiesan to Ojousan ; Patissier & Mademoiselle ; Patissier et Madamoiselle ; Patissier-san to Ojou-san ; Pâtissier et Mademoiselle ; パティシエさんとお嬢さん
description:
Description :
        Once a week, a young woman rewards herself by visiting her favorite ptisserie after work. The shop is run by two handsome brothersone of whom is always at the front of the shop when she arrives. While shyly ordering all the cakes that catch her eye, the young woman often wonders what the ptissier thinks of her. Simultaneously, said ptissier tries to work up the courage to ask for her name, failing to do so with each attempt. As the woman returns to the same shop time and time again, the ptissier must find a way to approach her if he wants to ever learn her name.
